name: Sphere (itch) (X20000)
description:
Sphere

ALL VERSIONS

Sphere is a small arcade game, which lets every player sink into his spell.

Overcome obstacles, defeat enemies, and direct the Sphere through the Gelaxy.

But be careful! After each wormhole, a boss could wait for you.

SPHERE PRO (Android)

We are working on another larger version of our game.

50 new levels with five other bosses, some new obstacles and the highlight:

Three more modes to play the game.

Have fun!

Windows / Linux version:
